name: Moltis
short_description: Self-hosted Moltis server with web UI and Docker access.
description: Self-hosted Moltis server with web UI and Docker access. Moltis is a self-hosted application focused on ai, tools, docker, containers. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Moltis on your home server to self-hosted moltis server with web ui and docker access without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Moltis to manage your ai workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
